::The Lavacons::

        Astral continues firing at DevilDuer, letting the=
 shots hit him.  They stung, but, this was Admiral Astral, and he wasn't go=
ing to let down until DevilDuer was either destroyed or taken prisoner.
~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Fenox woke up, and saw Rec=
klessa fighting Hiss and Scavanger.

      Suddenly, Fenox just felt a wave=
 of energeticism come over him, and he was hyper.

        "Go Recklessa!!!=
!  Come on, we'll take out these punks!!!!" He yelled, and fired his optic =
lazers at Scavanger.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Gr=
iplash grinned.

       "So, you want to have a sword duel??  So be it!!" G=
riplash said, blocking Pyro's sword with his own.  (Note to Pyro: Griplash =
doesn't have his lava blade charged up to melt things, just in case in come=
s to mind)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
              Starli=
ght yells in anger as she gets hit on the chest plate.

        "RRGHHH!!!!=
!!  Now I'm mad!!  You've crossed the line buster!!" She said, stomping her=
 foot on the ground, and then firing shots from her photon pistol.
~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Recklessa saw Fenox get up, and=
 cackled.

     "Let the games begin!!!!" She said and started firing her b=
urn beam gun at Hiss.
